Here's a brief overview of each:"}]]}]}]}],["$","div",null,{"className":"row","children":[["$","div",null,{"className":"col-lg-6","children":["$","div",null,{"className":"aximo-user-interface","children":[["$","h3",null,{"children":"1/ User Interface (UI):"}],["$","ul",null,{"children":[["$","li",null,{"children":"UI refers to the visual elements and the overall look and feel of a product. It encompasses the design of screens, pages, buttons, icons, and any other visual elements users interact with."}],["$","li",null,{"children":"UI designers are responsible for creating a visually appealing and consistent design that aligns with the brand or product's identity."}],["$","li",null,{"children":"Key aspects of UI design include layout, color schemes, typography, icons, and graphical elements."}]]}]]}]}],["$","div",null,{"className":"col-lg-6","children":["$","div",null,{"className":"aximo-user-interface","children":[["$","h3",null,{"children":"2/ User Experience (UX):"}],["$","ul",null,{"children":[["$","li",null,{"children":"UX focuses on the overall experience of the user when interacting with a product. It encompasses how users feel when they use the product and how easy or challenging it is to accomplish their goals."}],["$","li",null,{"children":"UX designers work to understand the user's needs, behaviors, and pain points, and they design the product maximizes user satisfaction."}],["$","li",null,{"children":"Key aspects of UX design include research, information architecture, wireframing, prototyping, usability testing, and user journey mapping."}]]}]]}]}]]}],["$","div",null,{"className":"aximo-faq-wrap","children":["$","div",null,{"className":"row","children":[["$","div",null,{"className":"col-lg-5 offset-lg-1 order-lg-1","children":["$","$L5",null,{"className":"aximo-service-details-thumb2 ","children":["$","$L4",null,{"src":{"src":"/clipotmx.github.io//_next/static/media/service-single2.ff4ddaca.png","height":1264,"width":1096,"blurDataURL":"data:image/png;base64,","blurWidth":7,"blurHeight":8},"alt":"service","sizes":"100vw"}]}]}],["$","div",null,{"className":"col-lg-6","children":[["$","div",null,{"className":"aximo-default-content","children":[["$","h2",null,{"children":["$","span",null,{"className":"aximo-title-animation","children":["Our Approach",["$","span",null,{"className":"aximo-title-icon","children":["$","$L4",null,{"src":"$6","alt":"star"}]}]]}]}],["$","p",null,{"children":"The working approach for UI/UX design involves a series of steps and methodologies to ensure that the user interface and user experience.
